summary:
12 Colourful easter eggs and nests and a Golden Rabbit. Includes Better Eggs.

Contents: 
Colourful eggs for easter and a gold rabbit.
Contents: 33 nif 14 DDS
descriptionHtml:
Name: Easter Eggs 
Author: Lord Inquisitor
Version: 1.0
Date: 08/04/2011
Cateogry: Modders Resource
Link: None
Homepage: None


===============
Short Description:
===============
12 Colourful easter eggs and nests and a Golden Rabbit. Includes Better Eggs.

Contents: 
Colourful eggs for easter and a gold rabbit.
Contents: 33 nif 14 DDS

===============
Description:
===============
12 Colourful easter eggs and nests and a Golden Rabbit. Includes Better Eggs

Contents: A sitting Rabbit Clutter Item. 12 coloured Eggs and Egg in nest. Aslo included Better eggs


===============
Update Details:
===============

1.0 N/A

===============
Requirements:
===============

The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim

===============
Install:
===============
Recommended path
1. Extract the files from the archive.
2.Copy files to
Meshes Paths should be:
Better Eggs:
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg03.nif (Brown Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg04.nif (Brown Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg05.nif (Brown Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg06.nif (Brown Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\ChickenNest01.nif (Brown Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\ChickenNest02.nif (Browner Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\ChickenNest03.nif (White Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\ChickenNest04.nif (Whiter Egg)
For replacer Rename chosen color to ChickenNest01.nif and Birdegg03.nif

Easter Eggs:
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest01.nif (Blue Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg01.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest02.nif (Duck Blue Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg02.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest03.nif (Green Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg03.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest04.nif (Green Pale Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg04.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest05.nif (Orange Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg05.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest06.nif (Orange pale Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg06.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest07.nif (Pink Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg07.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest08.nif (Pink Pale Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg08.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest09.nif (Red Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg09.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest10.nif (Red Pale Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg10.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest11.nif (Yellow Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg11.nif
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Easternest12.nif (Yellow Pale Egg)
\\Data\\meshes\\plants\\Birdegg12.nif
For replacer Rename chosen color to ChickenNest01.nif and Birdegg03.nif

\\Data\\Meshes\\Clutter\\Golden Rabbit\\Golden Rabbit.nif (Gold Goloured Rabbit item)

Texture Paths should be:
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\Egg\\Egg01.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\Egg\\Egg01_Blue_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\Egg\\Egg01_DuckBlue_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\Egg\\Egg01_Green_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\Egg\\Egg01_GreenPale_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\Egg\\Egg01_Orange_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\Egg\\Egg01_OrangePale_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\egg\\Egg01_Pink_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\egg\\Egg01_PinkPale_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\egg\\Egg01_Red_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\egg\\Egg01_RedPale_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\egg\\Egg01_Yellow_d.dds
\\Data\\textures\\Clutter\\Food\\egg\\Egg01_YellowPale_d.dds


===============
Hi-Res Tex pack users:
===============

Unclick the HighResTexturePack01.esp and HighResTexturePack01.esp from the launcher OR just add an X to the file type so HighResTexturePack01.esp becomes HighResTexturePack01.espX. This allows for replacer textures to work without being forcefully wiped out by the High Res Texture packs.
If it whines on loading its because it can\'t now override your textures.

or
change your \"Skyrim.ini\" to read this
[Archive]
sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa
sResourceArchiveList2=Skyrim - Voices.bsa, Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa

Skyrim.ini is found in C:\\Users\\Documents\\My Games folder

===============
Un-Install:
===============

1. Delete the folders associated with the mod

===============
Compatibility:
===============

No compatiblity issues so far.

===============
Bugs/Issues:
===============

No known issues so far, please let me know if you find any.

===============
History:
===============

===============
License/Legal:
===============

Use for your mods, but send me a download link to your mod if its released or post it in commments. So I can see what you did. I like seeing where my stuff is used in.


This file is provided as is and the author holds no responsiblity for anything that may come to happen from using this file.
